DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical investigation evaluate safety effectiveness Barrel™ VRD use facilitate endovascular coil wide-neck bifurcating branch intracranial aneurysm approve embolic coil .
DOC.brief_title: The Reverse Barrel™ VRD Intracranial Aneurysm Trial
DOC.criteria: Summary 1 . Male female ≥18 year old . 2 . A wide neck , intracranial , bifurcate branch aneurysm neck ≥4 mm dometoneck ratio < 2 , include nonde novo aneurysms stent utilize . 3 . Subject 's aneurysm arise parent vessel diameter ≥ 2.0 mm ≤ 4mm , measure 2D Digital Subtraction Angiography ( DSA ) . 4 . Subject respond anticoagulation antiplatelet therapy accord test use study center . 5 . Subject eligible undergo procedure use contrast medium . 6 . Subject willing comply protocol requirement return treatment center require clinical evaluation followup . 7 . Subject give write informed consent . 8 . Life expectancy > 12 month . Summary 1 . Subject present rupture aneurysm , unless rupture occur 30 day prior screen . 2 . Subject currently undergo radiation therapy . 3 . Subject known allergy nickeltitanium metal . 4 . Subject known allergy aspirin , heparin , ticlopidine , clopidogrel . 5 . Subject lifethreatening allergy contrast medium ( unless treatment allergy tolerate ) . 6 . Subject know cardiac disorder , likely associate cardioembolic symptom atrial fibrillation ( AFIB ) . 7 . Subject condition , opinion treat physician , would place subject high risk embolic stroke . 8 . Subject currently participate another clinical research study . 9 . Subject previous intracranial stenting procedure associate target aneurysm . 10 . Subject unable complete require followup . 11 . Subject pregnant breastfeeding . ( Females childbearing potential must pregnancy test provide write proof pregnant prior inclusion . ) 12 . Subject participate drug study within last 30 day . 13 . Subject unwilling take ASA/Clopidogrel minimum least 3 month follow procedure . 14 . Extradural aneurysm .
